alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Cass; Harrison; Marion (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 9:32PM CDT until April 12 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MARION...WESTERN CASS...EASTERN HARRISON AND SOUTH CENTRAL BOWIE COUNTIES... At 932 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Dalby Springs to near Jefferson, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Marshall, Waskom, Jefferson, Linden, Karnack, Lodi, Fairview, Scottsville, Marietta, Spring Hill, Jonesville, Pruett and Bryans Mill. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
